extensions.name: zendesk
extensions.label: Zendesk
extensions.description: Integrates Cognigy.AI with Zendesk Support, Chat, and Talk
extensions.longDescription: Zendesk develops and markets software for customer service, sales, and other customer interactions. This integration exposes several functions that enables the virtual agent to maintain support tickets, request callbacks in Talk or handover a Webchat conversation to Zendesk Chat.

nodes.description: Creates a new Ticket in Zendesk
Create a new User in Zendesk
Updates a ticket in Zendesk
Searches for Help Center Articles
Retrieves all categories of the Help Center
Checks if an agent is available in Zendesk Chat
Retrieves the list of phone numbers from Zendesk
Creates a new callback request in Zendesk
Initializes the Zendesk Chat within the Cognigy Webchat

extensions.name: twilio
extensions.label: Twilio
extensions.description: Integrates Cognigy.AI with Twilio
extensions.longDescription: Twilio is an American cloud communications platform as a service (CPaaS) company based in San Francisco, California. It allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication functions using its web service APIs. With the Twilio integration, the virtual agent can send SMS messages to any chat or voice user in order to start a multi-factor authentication process or send additional information in parallel.

nodes.description: Sends an SMS

extensions.name: abbyy-vantage
extensions.label: Abbyy Vantage
extensions.description: Run Vantage Skills and use Transaction results within the further conversation
extensions.longDescription: ABBYY Vantage is an Intelligent Document Processing platform providing easily consumable AI “skills” that understand your documents in a fast and simple way. Vantage makes today’s digital worker, and processes, smarter with pre-trained skills that read, understand, and extract insights from documents, helping enterprises accelerate digital transformation. Built with ABBYY’s leading OCR, NLP, and machine learning technology, Vantage can identify documents and extract data from them without using any pre-defined templates. Vantage no code / low code design approach makes it easy for business users to quickly design, train, and deploy skills that handle the complexities of understanding content, without being a machine learning expert. Document processing and data extraction with exceptional accuracy and ongoing learning continuously improves straight-through-processing rates. With several pre-trained document skills available, Vantage enables organizations to quickly expand their automation initiatives to additional business areas.

nodes.description: Authenticates the virtual agent to run skills
Retrieve all available skills
Runs a given transaction in Abbyy Vantage
Retrieves the result of a transaction

extensions.name: aws
extensions.label: Amazon Web Services
extensions.description: This extension facilitates calls to a number of relevant AWS APIs. Now you can call the AWS SDK from Cognigy, without a single line of code.
extensions.longDescription: Installing the AWS integration enables the virtual agent to make use of Amazon Web Service functions such as S3, Lambda or Polly. Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS) is a subsidiary of Amazon providing on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to individuals, companies, and governments, on a metered pay-as-you-go basis. These cloud computing web services provide a variety of basic abstract technical infrastructure and distributed computing building blocks and tools. This Extension facilitates calls to several relevant AWS APIs. Now you can call the AWS SDK from Cognigy, without a single line of code. Installing this extension will add the Nodes:

nodes.description: This Node invoke a Lambda function, supplying input data as a JSON object, and receiving return results and output data as a JSON object.
This Node 'Gets' (reads) a file from an S3 bucket
This Node 'Puts' (writes) a file into an S3 bucket
Uses AWS Polly to turn text into audio speech, via the AWS Polly service

extensions.name: bamboo-hr
extensions.label: Bamboo HR
extensions.description: Connects the Bamboo Human Resources system to Cognigy.AI
extensions.longDescription: The Software of BambooHR collects and organizes all the information you gather throughout the employee life cycle, then helps you use it to achieve great things. Whether you’re hiring, onboarding, preparing compensation, or building culture, BambooHR gives you the time and insights to focus on your most important asset—your people.

nodes.description: This Node retieves all employees of an organization and stores it in the Cognigy Input or Context

extensions.name: calendly
extensions.label: Calendly
extensions.description: Connects Calendly in order to use meeting information
extensions.longDescription: Calendly works with personal calendars and customizes schedules based on availability preferences and time-zone detection. The integration works to save users time, control their schedule and prevent last-minute meetings and scheduling conflicts through buffer times, daily limit and secret event types.

nodes.description: Get information about a Calendly user
Get information about a Calendly event
Get a list of invitees of a given event
Get a list of available events of this user that can be booked
List all scheduled events of a user

extensions.name: cognigy
extensions.label: Cognigy Customs
extensions.description: Contains various Cognigy Flow Node extensions
extensions.longDescription: Next to the natively provided Flow Nodes in Cognigy.AI, this Extension exposes custom functions which use Cognigy-related APIs and systems.

nodes.description: Retrieves the current conversation from the OData endpoint
Handle Intent disambiguations and let the user decide
Send an email with an uploaded attachment

extensions.name: cognigy-webchat
extensions.label: Cognigy Webchat
extensions.description: Change various Webchat settings within the conversation
extensions.longDescription: This Extension enables the virtual agent to change different webchat settings during the conversation. There are a bunch of different methods being provided in order to manipulate the Cognigy Webchat widget.

nodes.description: Changes the Bot Avatar in the Webchat window
Changes the User Avatar in the Webchat window
Changes the Agent Avatar in the Webchat window
Reset the Bot Avatar to the default one
Reset the User Avatar to the default one
Reset the User Agent to the default one

extensions.name: confluence
extensions.label: Confluence
extensions.description: Search for knowledge articles in Confluence
extensions.longDescription: Confluence is a popular collaboration tool that allows teams to work together by writing knowledge articles, how-to's and other guides. By using Confluence in conjunction with Cognigy.AI, it is possible to create intelligent bots that can search through your Confluence knowledge base and give detailed instructions.

nodes.description: Retrieves all pages from a specified space in Confluence
Searches for articles based on a specified query

extensions.name: deepl
extensions.label: DeepL
extensions.description: Translate text with DeepL
extensions.longDescription: DeepL Translator is a neural machine translation service developed by DeepL GmbH. This integration exposes the translation function in order to translate any text during a conversation.

nodes.description: Translates any text to a selected target language

extensions.name: dhl
extensions.label: DHL
extensions.description: Get the delivery status and look for DHL locations
extensions.longDescription: DHL International GmbH is an international courier, package delivery and express mail service, which is a division of the German logistics firm Deutsche Post. This integration allows you to access functions made available via the DHL API.

nodes.description: Get the tracking status of a package
Find DHL locations

extensions.name: elastic-search
extensions.label: Elastic Search
extensions.description: With this Extension one can query Elastic Search to use these information within the conversation.
extensions.longDescription: Elasticsearch is a search engine based on the Lucene library. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents. With this Extension one can query Elastic Search to use the results within the conversation.

nodes.description: Queries the Elastic Search index and returns the result

extensions.name: facebook-messenger
extensions.label: Facebook Messenger
extensions.description: Custom Facebook Messenger functions
extensions.longDescription: This integration enables the virtual agent to request and access custom user location data in order to provide valuable results during a conversation. For example, the nearest store could be found.

nodes.defaultLabel: Get User Location from Pinned Location
nodes.description: With this node you can use the Facebook location data that is sent from a user by a pinned location message

This node returns the same result as the Get User Location From Pinned Location Message node, except in this case the returned location is not the user's current location but the closest location google maps can provide based on the given data (place)

extensions.name: file-upload
extensions.label: File Upload
extensions.description: Triggers the file-upload Webchat Plugin
extensions.longDescription: This integration allows the user to upload files to a third party storage account triggering the file-upload Webchat plugin, depending on the third party storage used, we will have to set them up accordingly.

nodes.description: Uploads a file to an AWS S3 bucket
Uploads a file to an Azure Container

extensions.name: google-firebase
extensions.label: Google Firebase
extensions.description: Enables CRUD operations for the Firebase Realtime Database
extensions.longDescription: Firebase is a platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications. It was originally an independent company founded in 2011. In 2014, Google acquired the platform and it is now their flagship offering for app development. With this integration one can store any kind of data in a in Google Firebase realtime database.

nodes.description: Performs a GET request and returns the result from the Realtime Database
Performs a POST request and stores a JSON object to the Realtime Database
Updates a specific object in the Realtime Database

extensions.name: google-maps
extensions.label: Google Maps
extensions.description: Adds Google Maps functions
extensions.longDescription: Google Maps is a web mapping platform and consumer application offered by Google. It offers satellite imagery, aerial photography, street maps, 360° interactive panoramic views of streets, real-time traffic conditions, and route planning for traveling by foot, car, air and public transportation. There are two ways to use this Extension. Use the Google Maps Geocoding API to get the longitude and latitude of the address. Important to note, is that you need to enable the Geocoding API and the Maps JavaScript API, while the first one is used to get the latitude and longitude from the search query and the second one to show it with the Webchat Plugin. If the Search query field is empty or no Place was found, the module uses the default values from Latitude and Longitude.

nodes.description: Displays a Google Map in the Webchat window by using the google-maps Webchat Plugin
This node can be used in order to get location information about the current user

extensions.name: google-sheets
extensions.label: Google Sheets
extensions.description: Use external information from a Google Sheet
extensions.longDescription: Google Sheets is a spreadsheet program included as part of the free, web-based Google Docs Editors suite offered by Google. The app allows users to create and edit files online while collaborating with other users in real-time. Edits are tracked by user with a revision history presenting changes. An editor's position is highlighted with an editor-specific color and cursor and a permissions system regulates what users can do. Updates have introduced features using machine learning, including Explore, offering answers based on natural language questions in a spreadsheet.

nodes.description: Extract data information from a Google Spreadsheet
Add a new row of values to an existing Spreadsheet

extensions.name: google-translator
extensions.label: Google Translator
extensions.description: Translate text or detect a language with Google Translate
extensions.longDescription: Google Translate is a multilingual neural machine translation service developed by Google, to translate text, documents and websites from one language into another. Google Translate supports 109 languages at various levels.

nodes.description: Translate any text to a specified language
Detect the language of a text

extensions.name: here
extensions.label: Here
extensions.description: Adds Here specific features
extensions.longDescription: Adds Here specific features

nodes.description: Get the current geolocation by free text

extensions.name: hubspot
extensions.label: Hubspot
extensions.description: Find and update contacts or companies in Hubspot
extensions.longDescription: HubSpot is an American developer and marketer of software products for inbound marketing, sales, and customer service. Its products and services aim to provide tools for customer relationship management, social media marketing, content management, lead generation, web analytics, search engine optimization, live chat, and customer support.

nodes.description: Create a new compnay in Hubspot
Create a new contact in Hubspot
Find a contact in Hubspot based on a query
Find a contact in Hubspot by their email address

Update a contact in Hubspot

extensions.name: jira
extensions.label: Jira
extensions.description: Perform ticket operations in Atlassian Jira
extensions.longDescription: Jira is a suite of agile work management solutions that powers collaboration across all teams from concept to customer, empowering you to do the best work of your life, together. Jira offers several products and deployment options that are purpose-built for Software, IT, Business, Ops teams, and more. This integration uses the term ticket as a generic term for any Jira issue. This can be a UserStory, Issue, etc.

nodes.description: Create a new ticket in Jira
Extract a ticket number from a user text message
Get a ticket by number

extensions.name: intrafind
extensions.label: Intrafind
extensions.description: Perform document search via Intrafind
extensions.longDescription: People can use Intrafind's enterprise search and document intelligence products to quickly find and link existing information in their company, ensuring that they always have the right insights for their tasks and decisions. This extension contains functionality for document searching

nodes.description: Search for Documents via Intrafind

extensions.name: microsoft-graph
extensions.label: Microsoft Graph
extensions.description: Login a user with Microsoft and use the Graph API
extensions.longDescription: The Microsoft Extension enables the Cognigy.AI virtual agent to login a user to a specific Microsoft Azure Directory Tenant. With this login process in mind, the virtual agent is now able to use the Microsoft Graph API in order to execute multiple functions. In a chat conversation, the user now can be greeted with their real name, schedule new meeting in their calendar, send a message to a teams channel and more.

nodes.description: Get the login access token in order to use the Graph API
Display the microsoft login button by using the microsoft-auth Webchat Plugin
Get events from the logged in user's outlook calendar
Get the details of the logged in microsoft user
Schedule a meeting in the logged in user's outlook calendar
Create a new To Do task for the logged in user
Get all available To Do lists forthe logged in user
Send an email with the logged in user's outlook account
Post a message into a microsoft teams channel

extensions.name: microsoft-azure
extensions.label: Microsoft Azure
extensions.description: Intrates with the Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services
extensions.longDescription: Microsoft Azure, often referred to as Azure, is a cloud computing service operated by Microsoft for application management via Microsoft-managed data centers. It provides software as a service, platform as a service and infrastructure as a service and supports many different programming languages, tools, and frameworks, including both Microsoft-specific and third-party software and systems.

nodes.description: Detect named entities in a given text
Detect the language of a given text
Get the sentiment, the mood, of a given text and use it for further decisions in the Flow

Transcribes a WhatsApp voice message

extensions.longDescription: SharePoint is a web-based collaborative platform that integrates with Microsoft Office. Launched in 2001, SharePoint is primarily sold as a document management and storage system, but the product is highly configurable, and its usage varies substantially among organizations.

nodes.description: Returns the entire information of a given Sharepoint site
This node returns all items of a specified list

extensions.name: openai
extensions.label: OpenAI
extensions.description: Integrates with OpenAI GPT-3
extensions.longDescription: OpenAI is committed to the safe deployment of AI. Since the launch of this API, people made deploying applications faster and more streamlined while adding new safety features. Our progress with safeguards makes it possible to remove the waitlist for GPT-3. Starting today, developers in supported countries can sign up and start experimenting with our API right away. Source: https://openai.com/blog/api-no-waitlist/. Install the Extension to generate text automatically using OpenAI within a chat or voice conversation.

nodes.description: Generates a new text based on a given prompt

extensions.name: amazon-connect
extensions.label: Amazon Connect
extensions.description: Exposes helper functions for an Amazon Connect Contact Flow
extensions.longDescription: Amazon Connect is a cloud contact center that can be up and running in minutes, on both telephone and chat channels. It has a pay-as-you-go pricing model that many businesses are starting to find attractive. With Amazon Connect being so easy to access, all of a sudden, the power of Conversational AI can be readily employed in contact centers of all shapes and sizes.

nodes.description: Ends the current call session and hangs up the phone
Transfers the current call to a queue in Connect or a specific phone number

extensions.name: microsoft-powerautomate
extensions.label: Microsoft Power Automate
extensions.description: Trigger automation processes within a virtual agent conversation
extensions.longDescription: Empower everyone to build automated processes with flows in Power Automate. Use low-code, drag-and-drop tools and hundreds of pre-built connectors that automate repetitive, mundane tasks with ease. (https://powerautomate.microsoft.com/en-us/) With the Cognigy.AI Extension users can benefit from human-like, automated conversations to answer various questions. Furthermore, the virtual agent can start an asynchronous process and inject the result back to the conversation as soon as the process is finisheed.

nodes.description: Starts a Flow in Power Automate

extensions.name: freshdesk
extensions.label: Freshdesk
extensions.description: Provides ticket management functions
extensions.longDescription: Freshdesk is built to propel agent productivity and speedy response to customers. Agents can easily stay on top of all tickets and work collaboratively with teammates to efficiently resolve customer issues. Prioritize, categorize, and assign tickets to the right agents and leverage the power of your entire organization to deliver customer delight. (https://freshdesk.com/ticketing)

nodes.description: Creates a new ticket
Retrieves a ticket by a given ID
Updates a ticket by a given ID with dynamic values
Returns a list of tickets by a given filter
Responds to the user on a ticket

extensions.name: service-now-live-agent
extensions.label: Service Now Live Agent
extensions.description: Integrates with the Service Now Live Agent Workspace
extensions.longDescription: Deliver resilient services that increase productivity and create amazing experiences wherever your employees work, with the most innovative ITSM solution (Service Now, 2021).

extensions.name: hypatos
extensions.label: Hypatos
extensions.description: Integrates with Hypatos for document processing
extensions.longDescription: Manual document processing is slow, costly and error-prone leading to fraud and overpayments. Hypatos automates every stage of document processing at a high level of accuracy thanks to the deep learning technology honed over years with enterprise clients. With this Cognigy.AI Extension, the user can simply take a photo of a document and let the virtual agent extract all necessary information, such as names, addresses, prices, and more. (Source: https://www.hypatos.ai/)

Retrieves the results of the uploaded document

Our enterprise-grade CX solutions provide end-to-end insights across the value chain, allowing you to connect real-time business data and signals to improve loyalty, customer retention, and revenue. extensions.longDescription: Elevate customer experience and increase team productivity with an enterprise-ready agent platform that enables service teams to communicate in real-time and asynchronously with customers and employees. It provides Contact Centers with an AI-powered, fully integrated toolset that enables better customer services at scale. (source: https://www.cognigy.com/products/cognigy-live-agent)

extensions.name: bitly

extensions.longDescription: With this Extension, any long URL can be transformed into a shorter version. Thus, the virtual agent can provide a better user experience on chat channels when it comes to sharing URLs.

extensions.longDescription: Integrates with 8x8

This node allows you to collect customer information and match it with the native CRM case.

extensions.name: commercetools
extensions.label: commercetools
extensions.description: Integrates with commercetools
extensions.longDescription: With this Extension, the Cognigy.AI Virtual Agent is able to manage customer orders or suggest products based on the users' ideas. Therefore, it could be used in e-commerce use-cases on a website/app or within a physical store in order to assist the store manager with stock information.

nodes.description: Retrieve the customer information based on the full name or email address.

extensions.name: aleph-alpha
extensions.label: Aleph Alpha
extensions.description: Integrates with Aleph Alpha Luminous language models
extensions.longDescription: The Luminous series is a family of large language models. Large language models are powerful technological tools that can process and produce human text. They have acquired this ability by “reading” enormous amounts of human text data during training. Similar to someone reading a whole library and half of the internet, large language models have acquired a structural understanding of language and accumulated information about the world. With this Extension, those language models can be used within a virtual agent conversation on voice and chat channels.

nodes.description: Answers a question based on a given source text
Creates a summary of a given text

extensions.name: anthropic
extensions.label: Anthropic
extensions.description: Integrates Cognigy.AI with Anthropic Claude language model
extensions.longDescription: Claude can be a delightful company representative, a research assistant, a creative partner, a task automator, and more. Personality, tone, and behavior can all be customized to your needs. With this Extension, this language model, Claude, can be used within a virtual agent conversation on voice and chat channels.

nodes.description: Sends a prompt to Claude for completion

extensions.name: microsoft-powerbi
extensions.label: Microsoft Power BI
extensions.description: Integrates Cognigy.AI with Microsoft Power BI for Data Extraction
extensions.longDescription: Power BI is a business analytics service from Microsoft. The goal is to provide interactive visualization and business analysis capabilities with an interface so simple that end users can create their own reports and dashboards. With this Extension, a virtual agent can extract specific data from a Power BI dataset -- based on the natural query of the user.

nodes.description: Executes Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) query against the provided dataset

extensions.name: microsoft-bing
extensions.label: Microsoft Bing
extensions.description: Integrates Cognigy.AI with Microsoft Bing for searching the web
extensions.longDescription: The Microsoft Bing Extension for Cognigy is a powerful tool that integrates Bing's search capabilities directly into the Cognigy platform, enabling users to leverage Bing's vast knowledge and information within their conversational AI workflows. By seamlessly accessing Bing's search results, images, news, and more, the extension enhances the conversational experience by providing accurate and up-to-date information to users through their Cognigy virtual agents.

nodes.description: Searches the web with Bing

extensions.name: bvg
extensions.label: BVG
extensions.description: This Extension uses the open BVG Transport REST API in order to search for stops and display current departures or arrivals
extensions.longDescription: This Extension utilizes the BVG Transport API to search for stops and display current departures or arrivals, offering features such as filtering transportation types and outputting results as interactive messages.

nodes.description: Finds a list of stations based on a query
Returns the departure or arrival information
